```{r load_stns,cache=TRUE,echo=TRUE,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE,include=TRUE}

nybikes_db <- src_sqlite(
  "../../R/Citibike/nybikes.db"
  )


stns_sql <- # convert db table to R dataframe
  tbl( # load a database table
    nybikes_db,
    sql("select * from stns")
    )


stns <- collect(stns_sql)

```


```{r eval=FALSE}
# Load the full bikes dataframe

load("bikes.RData")

# Summarise by hour and journey made!

bla <- bikes %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    journey = paste(
      start_hash,
      end_hash,
      sep = ""
      ),
    time = round_date(
      starttime,
      "hour"
      )
    ) %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    start_hash != end_hash
    ) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(
    gender,
    start_hash,
    end_hash,
    journey,
    time
    ) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    num = n(),
    dur = mean(tripduration)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(
    desc(num)
    ) 

```

```{r eval=FALSE}
# How many different journey combinations have people done?

bla %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(
    journey,
    add = FALSE
    ) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    num = n()
    ) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    num = n()
    )


################

# Create journey times tbl

#### extract journey data to make a new table of distances and estimated journey times:

journeys <- bla %>% 
  dplyr::group_by() %>%
  dplyr::filter(start_hash != end_hash) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    start_hash = as.character(start_hash),
    end_hash = as.character(end_hash)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::group_by(
    start_hash,
    end_hash,
    journey
    ) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    nobs = n()
)
```

```{r,fig.width=12,fig.height=12}
#load("journeys1.RData")

#     by =  "journey"

#   group_by() 

# save(
#   bikes_journey_join, 
#   file = "bikes_journey_join.RData"
#   )

load("bikes_journey_join.RData")

bla1 <- bikes_journey_join %>%
  mutate(
    hour = hour(time),
    we = ifelse(
      (wday(time) %in% c(1,7)),
      "Weekend",
      "Weekday"
      )
    )

ggplot(
  data = bla1 %>%
    dplyr::filter(
      !is.na(gender),
      dur <= seconds,
      dur < 10000
      ),
  aes(
    x = seconds,
    y = dur,
    color = gender
    )
  )+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3)+
  geom_point(
    data = bla1 %>%
      dplyr::filter(
        !is.na(gender),
        dur > seconds,
        dur < 5000
        ),
    alpha = 0.01
    )+
  geom_abline(
    aes(
      a = 1,
      b = 1
      )
    )+
  facet_wrap(~hour)



ggplot(
  data = bla1 %>%
    dplyr::filter(
      !is.na(gender),
      dur <= seconds,
      dur < 5000
      ),
  aes(
    x = seconds,
    y = dur,
    color = gender
    )
  )+
  geom_point(alpha = 0.3)+
  geom_point(
    data = bla1 %>%
      dplyr::filter(
        !is.na(gender),
        dur > seconds,
        dur < 10000
        ),
    alpha = 0.01
    )+
  geom_abline(
        aes(
      a = 1,
      b = 1
      )
    )+
  facet_wrap(~we)


ggplot(
  data = bikes_journey_join %>%
    filter(
      !is.na(gender),
      dur < 3000
      ) %>%
    mutate(
      hour = hour(time),
      we = ifelse(
        (wday(time) %in% c(1,7)),
        "Weekend",
        "Weekday"
        )
      ),
  aes(
    x = seconds,
    y = dur,
    color = gender
    )
  )+
  geom_point(
    alpha = 0.2
    )+
  geom_smooth(method = "lm")+
  geom_abline(
        aes(
      a = 1,
      b = 1
      )
    )
```

```{r,eval=FALSE}

load("bla5.RData")

 
#save(journey_times,file="google_journey_times.RData")


#####

bla6 <- bla5 %>%
  dplyr::select(
    -start_id,-end_id
    ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    diff = (est_dur - dur)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    #diff < 2000,
    #diff > -2000
    # observed is less than expected - they must be gonding straight to the destination station!
    end_hash == "00eb16",
    dur < est_dur
    )

plot(
  bla6$diff, 
  type = "h"
  )



bla6 %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(
    end_hash,gender
    ) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    mean = mean(dur),
    obs = n()
    )

ggplot(
  bla6 %>%
    dplyr::filter(
      end_hash == "00eb16"
      ),
  aes(
    x = dur,
    y = est_dur,
    color = gender
    )
  )+
  geom_point()+
  scale_x_continuous(
    limits = c(0,3000)
    )+
  geom_smooth()


```

# Trying again to keep date involved

```{r,eval=FALSE}

bla <- bikes %>%
  dplyr::filter(
    end_hash != start_hash
    ) %>%
  dplyr::mutate(
    journey = paste(
      start_hash,
      end_hash,
      sep = ""
      ),
    date = round_date(
      starttime,
      "hour"
      )
    ) %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(
    gender,
    start_hash,
    end_hash,
    journey,
    date
    ) %>%
  dplyr::summarise(
    num = n(),
    dur = mean(tripduration)
    ) %>%
  dplyr::arrange(
    desc(num)
    ) 


save(bla,file="bla_with_hour.RData")
```
